pages.text: $(l)Category:$() Small Carnivore $(br)$(l)Tamable:$() True $(br)$(l)Aggression:$() Neutral $(br)$(l)Type:$() Solo Hunter $(br)$(l)Found In:$() Grasslands
Journal Page by $(l)HannahPBnJ$() $(br2)The Oviraptor is a small, swift carnivore that can collect eggs for the player once tamed. Oviraptor can be tamed as a baby or an adult with meat or eggs.
